title: Add user authentication
body:
## Summary

Implement OAuth2 authentication flow.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Support GitHub OAuth
- [ ] Support Google OAuth
- [ ] Session management

title: Fix database connection leak
body:
Database connections are not being properly closed after queries.

### Steps to reproduce

1. Run 100 queries
2. Check connection pool

### Expected

Connections should be released.

### Actual

Connections accumulate.

title: Documentation: API reference
